title: React Component Architecture
description: Build a complex React application demonstrating component composition, state management, and performance optimization techniques.
instructions:
Create a task management application with the following features:
- User authentication
- CRUD operations for tasks
- Drag and drop functionality
- Real-time updates
- Responsive design

Submit your code via GitHub repository with detailed README.

title: Binary Search Tree Implementation
description: Implement a complete Binary Search Tree with all standard operations and analyze time complexities.
instructions:
Implement a BST class with the following methods:
- insert(value)
- delete(value)
- search(value)
- inorderTraversal()
- preorderTraversal()
- postorderTraversal()
- getHeight()
- getSize()

Include comprehensive unit tests and complexity analysis.

title: SEO Audit & Strategy Report
description: Conduct a comprehensive SEO audit of a website and create an optimization strategy.
instructions:
Choose a small business website and perform:
1. Technical SEO audit
2. Content analysis
3. Keyword research
4. Competitor analysis
5. Create actionable recommendations

Submit a professional report (PDF) with screenshots and data.
